sourceMeaningMnemonic: There is an <radical>animal</radical> in the <radical>grass</radical> and your horrible <radical>task</radical> is to go <kanji>hunting</kanji> for it.
meaningInfo: Picture the shape of the animal in the grass, off in the distance. You can't see what kind of animal it is yet, but you know you're hunting it.
readingMnemonic: You're currently <kanji>hunting</kanji> in a <reading>row</reading> (<reading>りょう</reading>) boat and you have to row as quietly and carefully as you can or the animal will run away.
readingInfo: You wouldn't be able to go hunting in any other kind of boat—the motor would be too loud. Picture yourself in a row boat with all of your hunting gear. You need to be extra careful not to make any loud splashing sounds with the oars!
